blocks.heading: Structured profile
blocks.content: Use our simple guided template to create a profile with maximum impact and relevance; no more random resumés which don’t sell you well

blocks.heading: Job alerts
blocks.content: Whether or not you’re actively looking for work, turn on job notifications to hear of relevant opportunities near you matching your skills and preferences.

worker.title: How much does it cost?
worker.text: During Covid-19, we have a special $99 fixed placement fee.  As we add more automation features, we’ll be moving to a subscription with prices to suit companies of all sizes.  Recruiting relevant labour has never been this easy or this efficient.

work.title: How much does it cost?
work.text: It is and always will be completely FREE for workers.  Employers pay to advertise for roles.
